title: Italianopoli
text: Italianopoli is an online platform dedicated to sharing Italian culture, traditions, and lifestyle.

contentBlocks.text:
The goal of this project was to build a website that reflects the beauty and richness of Italian culture while being fast, reliable, and easy to use. \n' +
        'From a front-end perspective, this meant transforming static designs into interactive, responsive pages that look and feel great across all devices. \n' +
        'Special attention was given to pixel-perfect implementation, smooth navigation, and creating a layout that balances visual storytelling with performance.

Displaying rich content (recipes, cultural stories, travel insights) without overwhelming users.
From a front-end perspective, this meant transforming static designs into interactive, responsive pages that look and feel great across all devices.

Designed a modular layout with structured sections, easy navigation, and clean typography.
From a front-end perspective, this meant transforming static designs into interactive, responsive pages that look and feel great across all devices.

image.alt: Mockup of various pages on mobile device Italianopoli

outcome.label: Increased user engagement with interactive design
A platform that represents the essence of italian culture with a modern digital touch
